Name: Midnight Renegade
About the game: Midnight Renegade is a 2D Platformer. The story revolves around Lilly, a young lady who seeks to bring justice to a corrupt task force. In order to do this, she must defeat the chief and his subordinates, by means of shooting, attacking, and dodging. Throughout the game, she'll need to manage 6 inventory slots and 4 equipment slots. Enemies drop bread crumbs, which can be consumed to regenerate life. Some enemies have the potential to drop equipment items, which are capable of producing set bonuses when all pieces to a set are collected. Currency, ammo, and restoratives are treated as items and thus take inventory space. Lilly will find herself in ranged combat more often than not, and bullets have a limited carrying capacity, but they easily drop from defeated enemies and staggered bosses. Features: 20 minutes - 1 hour of gameplay 3 boss fights (+2 secret fights) Controller support Sound and brightness settings A few interactable NPCs 6 save slots Item drops and an inventory system 3 different guns Consuming bread to stay alive
